content: दय् {c1c} <ab>A.</ab> (दयते, दयित) {@--1@} To feel pity or compassion for, pity, sympathise with (with <ab>gen.</ab>); रामस्य दयमानोऽसावध्येति तव लक्ष्मणः <ls>Bk. 8. 119</ls>; तेषां दयसे न कस्मात् <ls n="Bk.">2. 33</ls>, <ls n="Bk.">15. 63</ls>. {@--2@} To love, like, be fond of; दयमानाः प्रमदाः <ls>Ś. 1. 4</ls>; <ls>Bk. 10. 9.</ls> {@--3@} To protect; नगजा न गजा दयिता दयिताः <ls>Bk. 10. 9.</ls> {@--4@} To go, move. {@--5@} To grant, give, divide or allot. {@--6@} To hurt.
